灝字的基本解释

灝
hào
见“灏”。

灝字的汉语字典释义

[①]［hào］
［《廣韻》胡老切，上晧，匣。］
“灏1”的繁体字。
(1)豆汁。
(2)通“浩”。水势无边际。
(3)通“浩”。浩大，广大。
(4)用同“顥”。明净。
(5)用同“皓”。白。参见“灝露”。

灝字的康熙字典解释

【巳集上】【水字部】　灝； 康熙笔画：25； 页码：页663第46
【唐韻】【正韻】胡老切【集韻】下老切【韻會】合老切，?音皓。灝溔，水勢遠也。　又灝灝，夷曠也。【揚子·法言】商書灝灝爾。【註】灝灝，猶漫漫也。通作皡。　又【說文】豆汁也。【長箋】禮用豆汁沐髮，故特制字。釋氏以灝浴身，故四月八月用豆浴佛。　又【集韻】古老切，音杲。又【廣韻】【集韻】?古禫切，音感。義?同。

Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［hào］
["Guangyun" Hu Laoqie, Shang Hao, Xia. ]
Traditional characters for "灏1".
(1) Soy juice.
(2) Link "Hao". The water potential is boundless.
(3) Link "Hao". Vast, vast.
(4) Use the same as "Hao". bright and clean.
(5) Use the same as "hao". White. See "Hao Lu".
Hao
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Siji 1] [Water Word Department] 　灏; Kangxi Strokes: 25; Page Number: Page 663 No. 46
[Tang Yun] [Zheng Yun] Hu Laoqie [Jiyun] Xia Laoqie [Yunhui] He Laoqie,? Yin Hao. Hao Yun, the water is far away.　You Hao Hao, Yi Kuang also. [Yangzi·Fayan] Shang Shu Hao Hao Er. [Note] Hao Hao is still long. Pass is made of jade.　[Said Wen] Soybean juice also. [Long note] Soybean juice is used for ritual, so it is specially made. Shi bathed his body with Hao, so in April and August he bathed the Buddha with beans.　[Jiyun] Ancient cut, sound Gao. Also [Guang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Gu Yu cut, sound sense. Righteous? Same.
